document_data.name: Rilimbrar Heltharn
document_data.Relationships:
Rilimbrar was the second son of King [[Lashilmbrar]] the Sly. His mother was named [[Thelmara Rorntarn]]. His older brother was [[Imphras III]], who never ruled.

Rilimbrar married [[Ilbritha Eirlthaum]] in [[1297 DR]]. They were the parents of [[Sambryl]] and other daughters but had no sons.
document_data.History:
Rilimbrar was born in [[1280 DR]]. Crowned at the age of fourteen years, when his father and older brother were killed in a bandit attack staged by his cousin [[Thaum]], Rilimbrar waited for two years to rule, while his uncle Crown Prince [[Kuskur]] sat on the throne in his place as regent. Rilimbrar was forced to flee to [[Aglarond]] in [[1295 DR]] when Thaum attacked Impiltur and defeated his army at the [[Battle of Five Heads]].{{Cite dragon/346/Impiltur: The Forgotten Kingdom|70}} He returned in [[1296 DR]] to rule after Thaum was killed.

Since he had no sons, he established a [[Lords of Imphras II|Council of Lords]] to rule the kingdom after his death, which occurred in [[1338 DR]] during a mysterious fire. At that point, his eldest daughter Sambryl became regent.
